players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, I'm surprised you found me. Maybe you misidentified me. I didn't kill Charlie. I think you might have misread clues."
You: "I suspect Bob is mafia, as he found Diana. Diana, you might be innocent."
Bob: "I was the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Charlie was killed by the mafia. Alice, your accusation is unfounded. Vote Diana."
Diana: " ... "
You: "Bob's claim is false. He can't be detective. He says Diana is mafia but we know the mafia killed Charlie. Bob must be mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I am the detective; my investigation confirmed Diana as mafia. Charlie was killed by mafia. Alice, you can't know my role. Vote Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, I'm surprised you found me. Maybe you misidentified me. I didn't kill Charlie. I think you might have misread clues."
Alice: "I suspect Bob is mafia, as he found Diana. Diana, you might be innocent."
You: "I was the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Charlie was killed by the mafia. Alice, your accusation is unfounded. Vote Diana."
Diana: " ... "
Alice: "Bob's claim is false. He can't be detective. He says Diana is mafia but we know the mafia killed Charlie. Bob must be mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "I am the detective; my investigation confirmed Diana as mafia. Charlie was killed by mafia. Alice, you can't know my role. Vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
